name: FREEDOOM
summary: Port of the original DOOM game with free assets.
description:
This is an adaptation of the original DOOM game.
In this adaptation you can play only the first 3 levels.
Every item, kill, secret or level increases your overall score,
while every second decreases your score.
What is the best score you can make?

Controls:
- LEFT/RIGHT/UP/DOWN to move
- CTRL to shoot
- SPACE to use
- TAB to see the map
- Hold SHIFT to run
